alert.note: Alert for Bartow; Floyd (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 09 at 6:00PM EDT until May 09 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Atlanta
info.description: The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Floyd County in northwestern Georgia... Southwestern Bartow County in northwestern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lindale, or near Rome, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rome, Shannon and Lindale. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. If you see wind damage...hail or flooding...wait until the storm has passed...and then call the National Weather Service toll free at 1 8 6 6 7 6 3 4 4 6 6 or tweet us your report at NWSATLANTA.
